NSCameraUsageDescription: MacroLoop needs camera access to take photos of your meals for automatic food logging. For example, photograph your plate and the app will identify the food and estimate portions.
NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: MacroLoop needs microphone access for voice-based food logging. For example, you can say 'chicken breast 200 grams' and the app will transcribe your speech to create a food entry.
NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: MacroLoop needs access to your photos so you can select meal images from your library for automatic food logging.
NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: MacroLoop needs speech recognition to convert your voice into text for hands-free food logging. For example, speak your meal details and the app will create a food entry from your words.
